title: Glyphs 2.2.2 [MAC OS X]
description:
MADE IN UKRAINE

Glyphs 2.2.2 â€“ Dependable and intuitive font editor.

Glyphs is a simple to use Mac OS X app designed to allow anyone to create new fonts and modify letterforms with ease. Glyphsâ€™ main focus lays on streamlining the workflow. Glyphs also comes with support for scripting. Scripts can help with a lot of repetitive tasks and will allow you to access all internal data and methods.
Glyphsâ€™ smart and simple approach helps you draw new fonts, modify existing fonts, and sculpt your letterforms hassle-free.

What's new in version 2.2.2: 
New features
- Improve handling of missing image.
- Slight adjustment of the drawing of end nodes.
- Only include 'Non-spacing' and 'Spacing combining' marks in mark/GDEF.
- Scroll to active glyph in new tab.
- Glyphs detail dialog does not change values directly, only if you press OK.
Fixed
- Problem with the updater.
- Removing of kerning pairs in kerning window with collapsed rows.
- Kerning of punctuation and more than one other script.
- Exporting UFO with production names.
- Version string for TTF export.
- Some undo problems.
- Text color in glyph info box when editing glyph name.
- Selection of color layers in layer panel.
- Import of math/Greek letters.
- Measurement tool in background layers.
- Error in CCMP feature.

MADE IN UKRAINE
